sqlMap.statement: SELECT SH.CTRY_CD FROM SHIP_TO_CUST SH WHERE SH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND SH.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD = #shipToCustCd# AND SH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
SELECT SE.CTRY_CD FROM SELL_TO_CUST SE WHERE SE.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND SE.SELL_TO_CUST_CD = #sellToCustCd# AND SE.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
